properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Tantanonao ny diany
Jehovah Tomponay
Fa be tokoa ny tahotray
Fa kely ny herinay.
He ! sarotra tokoa
Ny l√†lana haleha,
Mijere !

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
:
Tena sitrakay tokoa
Ny eo anilanao ry Ray
Sambatra ny fo
Tantanonao Tomponay.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Meteza hiaraka aminay
Fa sao dia very indray.
Ny fiainanay tapahinao
No fifalianay.
Ny miaraka aminao,
hataonay rehareha,
Maneke !

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Ianao no antom-piainanay
ianao no tanjakay
Vohanay ho Anao ny fo
Satria tempolinao.
Ny sitrakao hatao,
Ny vavakay ho to
Mihainoa !
